member.name: T:Pathfindax.Duality.PathfinderComponent
member.summary: Provides a way for other components to request a path from a to b WIP

member.name: M:Pathfindax.Duality.PathfinderManager.GetPathfinder(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the with the same id. If the parameter is null then the first pathfinder will be returned. If there are multiple pathfinders and no id was supplied this will throw a exception.
